question: You have been facing a lot of issues at work lately. Write a letter to your Reporting Manager informing him about this.In your letter:• Explain what / who is affecting your work and people's attitude towards you• What your expectations are from this work/office• How / what your manager can do to help you with these problems
text: I am writing this letter to draw your attention to the issues which I have been encountering at work and hoping that you would address my problems.

I want to let you know that my computer system shows some anomalies and whenever I try to log into a particular process portal, it automatically restarts. Due to this, my work is suffering. Although my colleagues have to manage the work on their own and because of this they are getting disappointed with me.

Even after raising multiple complaints to the support team, nothing has been done so far. Under these circumstances, I am unable to fulfil my assigned tasks on time. I feel these challenges can be fixed by replacing the laptop with another reliable system.

Therefore, I request you to take necessary action to resolve my computer problem and also would like to suggest that the IT support team must do a vigilant check prior to assigning the system to duty staff since it affects the executive’s performance.
I look forward to your response regarding this matter.
